product_description: 15/4 T x 220 W x 2200mm L Feature Grade European Oak Brushed Surface UV Matte Lacquer
standard_dimensions: 15/4 T x 220 W x 2200mm L (up to 25% Shorts)
reusable_description: Can be sanded multiple times, then recycled/reused when no longer required
minimisation_design_strategy: Layout Planning to minimize Wastage requirements. As a Multi width & length product, this also minimizes wastage
modern_slavery_comments: Meet the requirements for FSC as to Social Responsibility. A copy of our Social Corporate Responsibility Policy & Wood Sourcing Policy can be provided upon request.
factory_finished_description:
Moda Feature & Light Feature Plank - Multiple Colour Selections Available

Sustainably Sourced Feature Grade European Oak
Brushed Surface
UV Matte Lacquer

manufacturing_locations.location_name: Ho Chi Minh, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam

specific_installation_methods: Glue Down method of installation. This can be removed at end of life and the planks themselves recycled / re-used
other_comments:
This product also holds an NZ Codemark with an AU Codemark pending. 
Forté are a Toitū EnviroMark certified company.
type_of_packaging: Cardboard Boxing, with foam packing dividers. Boxes & foam can we recycled
